PAD_PlayersSeeShadowcursedLaezel.synopsis: Players comment on Lae'zel's fate after seeing her turned into a shadowcreature after telling her to go look for the creche on her own.
PAD_PlayersSeeShadowcursedLaezel.how_to_trigger: See Shadowcursed Laezel creature in SCL after telling her to go look for the creche on her own in Act2.

Intro.synopsis: Character Creation dialog for Avatar Lae'zel
Intro.how_to_trigger: Select the character as an avatar in character creation and click the button that plays their voiced character description

PAD_PlayersSeeShadowcursedLaezel_0.speaker: Player
PAD_PlayersSeeShadowcursedLaezel_0.text: Is that...? Hells - the shadows have taken Lae'zel.

Intro_3.text: Since I was born in the cold reaches of Wildspace, I have known but one purpose: to wield a silver sword and ride a red dragon in service of my regent, the githyanki queen Vlaakith.

Intro_1.text: My first step on this path is to slay a mind flayer and bring its head to my queen.

Intro_0.text: There is no flesh I will not carve and no barrier I will not shatter to see it done.

Intro_2.text: I am the one who sunders, I am the Undying Queen's most unshakeable warrior. I am Lae'zel of K'liir.
